org.expressme.webwind
Class HttpUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.expressme.webwind.HttpUtils

public class HttpUtils
extends java.lang.Object

HttpUtils that contains useful methods to access HTTP objects.

Author:
Michael Liao (askxuefeng@gmail.com)

getIntParameter

public static int getIntParameter(java.lang.String name,
                                  int defaultValue)
Get int-type parameter. If parameter is not exist, or cannot be converted to int, default value is return.

Parameters:
name - Parameter name.
defaultValue - Default int value.
Returns:
int value of specified parameter.

public static long getLongParameter(java.lang.String name,
                                    long defaultValue)
Get long-type parameter. If parameter is not exist, or cannot be converted to long, default value is return.

Parameters:

defaultValue - Default long value.
Returns:
long value of specified parameter.

getStringParameter

public static java.lang.String getStringParameter(java.lang.String name)
Get parameter value as String. If parameter is not exist, return null.

Parameters:
name - Parameter name.
Returns:
String value, or null if no such parameter.

getStringParameter

public static java.lang.String getStringParameter(java.lang.String name,
                                                  java.lang.String defaultValue)
Get parameter value as String. If parameter is not exist, return default value.

Parameters:
name - Parameter name.
defaultValue - Default String value.
Returns:
String value.

getParameterValues

public static java.lang.String[] getParameterValues(java.lang.String name)
Get parameter values as String array. If parameter name is not exist, empty String is returned which is different with HttpServletRequest.getParameterValues().

Parameters:
name - Parameter name.
Returns:
Parameter values as String array.

getCookie

public static java.lang.String getCookie(java.lang.String name)
Get cookie value by name. Return null if cookie is not found.

Parameters:
name - Cookie name.
Returns:
Cookie value.

getCookie

public static java.lang.String getCookie(java.lang.String name,
                                         java.lang.String defaultValue)
Get cookie value by name. Return default value if cookie is not found.

Parameters:
name - Cookie name.
defaultValue - Cookie default value.
Returns:
Cookie value.

removeCookie

public static void removeCookie(java.lang.String name)
Remove a cookie by name and its default path "/".

Parameters:
name - Cookie name.

removeCookie

public static void removeCookie(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String path)
Remove a cookie by name and its path.

Parameters:
name - Cookie name.
path - Cookie path.

setCookie

public static void setCookie(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String value,
                             int maxAgeInSeconds)
Set new cookie by name, value and max age, with default path "/".

Parameters:
name - Cookie name.
value - Cookie value.
maxAgeInSeconds - Cookie age in seconds.

setCookie

                             java.lang.String value,
                             int maxAgeInSeconds,
                             java.lang.String path)
Set new cookie by name, value, max age and path.

Parameters:
name - Cookie name.
value - Cookie value.
maxAgeInSeconds - Cookie age in seconds.
path - Cookie path.
